          <div style="font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 12px;">What would you do?</div>

            <button onclick="selectChoice(2, 'd')" class="choice-btn" data-choice="d" style="padding: 12px 16px; background: #1E1E36; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; color: #CBD5E1;">

          <div style="background: #1E1E36; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px; line-height: 1.7;">
            <p style="margin: 0;">A student with a documented learning disability has submitted work significantly better than their usual standard. You suspect AI involvement. The student hasn't disclosed AI use, but they have legitimate reasons to struggle with writing tasks.</p>
          </div>
          <div style="font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 12px;">What would you do?</div>
          <div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
            <button onclick="selectChoice(3, 'a')" class="choice-btn" data-choice="a" style="padding: 12px 16px; background: #1E1E36; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; color: #CBD5E1;">

      <h2 style="font-size: 22px; color: #E2E8F0; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">The Dilemma Navigator (continued)</h2>
      <p style="color: #64748B; margin-bottom: 20px;">Two more scenarios to consider. Remember, the goal is to examine your reasoning, not to find the "right" answer.</p>

          <div style="background: #1E1E36; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px; line-height: 1.7;">
            <p style="margin: 0;">You're writing a paper and use AI to help structure your literature review. The AI suggests sources and synthesizes themes. You verify the sources exist and are relevant. You're not sure how much to acknowledge this assistance.</p>

              C) Check the journal's AI policy and follow their guidelines

            <button onclick="selectChoice(4, 'd')" class="choice-btn" data-choice="d" style="padding: 12px 16px; background: #1E1E36; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; color: #CBD5E1;">

          <div style="background: #1E1E36; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px; line-height: 1.7;">
            <p style="margin: 0;">In a school meeting, a colleague advocates for banning all AI use in assessments. Another says that's unrealistic and disadvantages students. The Head of School asks for your view.</p>

<script>
(function() {
  var experienceId = 'what-would-you-do';
  var TOTAL_STEPS = 6;
  var STORAGE_KEY = 'ai-passport-steps-what-would-you-do';
  var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  var uid = urlParams.get('uid') || 'anonymous';

  // Step names for progress bar
  var stepNames = ['', 'Welcome', 'Scenarios 1-3', 'Scenarios 4-5', 'Framework', 'Your Role', 'Wrap Up'];

  // ---- Step state ----
  var currentStep = 1;
  var highestCompleted = 0;

  function loadProgress() {
    try {
      var saved = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '{}');
      highestCompleted = saved.highestCompleted || 0;
      currentStep = saved.currentStep || 1;
      if (currentStep > highestCompleted + 1) currentStep = highestCompleted + 1;
    } catch (e) {
      highestCompleted = 0;
      currentStep = 1;
    }
  }

  function saveProgress() {
    localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify({
      highestCompleted: highestCompleted,
      currentStep: currentStep
    }));
  }

  // ---- Progress bar rendering ----
  function renderProgressBar() {
    var bar = document.getElementById('progress-bar');
    var html = '';

    for (var i = 1; i <= TOTAL_STEPS; i++) {
      var isCompleted = i <= highestCompleted;
      var isCurrent = i === currentStep;
      var isLocked = i > highestCompleted + 1;

      // Connector line (before each step except the first)
      if (i > 1) {
        html += '<div style="flex: 1; max-width: 40px; height: 2px; background: ' +
          (i <= highestCompleted + 1 ? '#4F46E5' : '#2D2D4A') +
          '; align-self: center;"></div>';
      }

      // Step circle
      var bg, color, border, cursor, opacity;
      if (isCurrent) {
        bg = '#4F46E5'; color = 'white'; border = '2px solid #7C3AED'; cursor = 'default'; opacity = '1';
      } else if (isCompleted) {
        bg = '#0D2818'; color = '#22C55E'; border = '2px solid #22C55E'; cursor = 'pointer'; opacity = '1';
      } else {
        bg = '#1E1E36'; color = '#64748B'; border = '2px solid #2D2D4A'; cursor = 'default'; opacity = '0.5';
      }

      var clickHandler = isCompleted ? 'onclick="goToStep(' + i + ')"' : '';
      var title = isLocked ? 'Complete previous steps first' : stepNames[i];

      html += '<div ' + clickHandler + ' title="' + title + '" style="' +
        'width: 36px; height: 36px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; ' +
        'font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; flex-shrink: 0; transition: all 0.2s; ' +
        'background: ' + bg + '; color: ' + color + '; border: ' + border + '; cursor: ' + cursor + '; opacity: ' + opacity + ';">' +
        (isCompleted && !isCurrent ? '‚úì' : i) + '</div>';
    }

    bar.innerHTML = html;
  }

  // ---- Step navigation ----
  function showStep(step) {
    // Hide all steps
    document.querySelectorAll('.exp-step').forEach(function(el) {
      el.style.display = 'none';
    });

    // Show the target step
    var target = document.querySelector('.exp-step[data-step="' + step + '"]');
    if (target) {
      target.style.display = 'block';
    }

    currentStep = step;

    // Mark previous step as completed (if moving forward)
    if (step - 1 > highestCompleted) {
      highestCompleted = step - 1;
    }

    saveProgress();
    renderProgressBar();

    // Scroll to top of the experience
    document.getElementById('experience-app').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
  }

  // Expose globally for onclick handlers
  window.goToStep = function(step) {
    // Allow: completed steps, current step, or advancing one step via Continue
    if (step >= 1 && step <= TOTAL_STEPS && step <= highestCompleted + 2) {
      showStep(step);
    }
  };

  // ---- Scenario reflections ----
  var reflections = {
    1: { a: "Pragmatic. But consider: if AI helps craft extension requests, does it change how you evaluate sincerity?", b: "Reasonable middle ground without accusations. But are you applying this consistently?", c: "Direct, but potentially confrontational. What would you do with the answer?", d: "Focuses on what matters most. But if you see a pattern, should you address it?" },
    2: { a: "Acknowledges AI is increasingly normal. But does the level of involvement matter?", b: "Shows concern for process. How would you react if they said 'AI wrote most of it'?", c: "Proactive about transparency. Might this disadvantage your colleague?", d: "Strong stance. What threshold would make you comfortable?" },
    3: { a: "Principled consistency. But are accessibility accommodations also 'exceptions'?", b: "Thoughtful reframing. Where's the line between assistance and replacement?", c: "Humanizing approach. How do you avoid implying accusation?", d: "Collaborative and cautious. How might the student experience the wait?" },
    4: { a: "Common view, but increasingly contested. Why does AI feel different from a database?", b: "Balanced transparency. Does 'AI assisted' capture the involvement?", c: "Wisely defers to emerging norms. What if there's no policy yet?", d: "Cautious. Is the concern about AI, or about standing behind the work?" },
    5: { a: "Values clarity. But how do you enforce a ban?", b: "Pragmatic. How do you address colleagues feeling their expertise is devalued?", c: "Middle path. Does this burden individual staff to navigate ambiguity?", d: "Evidence-based. How do you support staff in the meantime?" }
  };

  window.selectChoice = function(scenario, choice) {
    var card = document.querySelector('.scenario-card[data-scenario="' + scenario + '"]');
    var buttons = card.querySelectorAll('.choice-btn');
    for (var i = 0; i < buttons.length; i++) {
      var btn = buttons[i];
      btn.style.borderColor = btn.dataset.choice === choice ? '#4F46E5' : '#2D2D4A';
      btn.style.background = btn.dataset.choice === choice ? '#1E1B4B' : '#1E1E36';
    }
    var ref = document.getElementById('reflection-' + scenario);
    ref.style.display = 'block';
    ref.innerHTML = '<strong style="color: #C7D2FE;">Consider:</strong><p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #A5B4FC;">' + reflections[scenario][choice] + '</p>';
  };

  // ---- Tab switching ----
  window.switchTab = function(tab) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.context-tab').forEach(function(t) {
      if (t.dataset.tab === tab) {
        t.style.background = '#4F46E5';
        t.style.color = 'white';
        t.style.fontWeight = 'bold';
      } else {
        t.style.background = '#1E1E36';
        t.style.color = '#64748B';
        t.style.fontWeight = 'normal';
      }
    });

    document.querySelectorAll('.tab-panel').forEach(function(p) {
      p.style.display = p.dataset.panel === tab ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
  };

  // ---- Completion tracking ----
  var badges = {
    1: { emoji: 'üß™', name: 'Explorer' },
    3: { emoji: 'üß†', name: 'Thinker' },
    5: { emoji: 'üõ†Ô∏è', name: 'Builder' },
    7: { emoji: 'üèÜ', name: 'Champion' }
  };

  window.recordCompletion = function() {
    var btn = document.getElementById('complete-btn');
    btn.disabled = true;
    btn.textContent = 'Recording...';
    btn.style.background = '#94A3B8';

    // Mark final step as completed
    highestCompleted = TOTAL_STEPS;
    saveProgress();
    renderProgressBar();

    saveToLocalStorage();
    showCompletionSuccess();
  };

  function saveToLocalStorage() {
    var completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    completions[experienceId] = {
      completedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
      uid: uid
    };
    localStorage.setItem('ai-passport-completions', JSON.stringify(completions));
  }

  function showCompletionSuccess() {
    document.getElementById('completion-trigger').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('completion-section').style.display = 'block';

    var completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    var completedCount = Object.keys(completions).length;

    var badgeHtml = '';
    var nextBadge = null;

    for (var count in badges) {
      if (completedCount >= parseInt(count)) {
        badgeHtml += '<span style="font-size: 24px; margin: 0 4px;" title="' + badges[count].name + '">' + badges[count].emoji + '</span>';
      } else if (!nextBadge) {
        nextBadge = { count: parseInt(count), emoji: badges[count].emoji, name: badges[count].name };
      }
    }

    var progressText = '<div style="margin-bottom: 8px;">' + (badgeHtml || '<span style="color: #94A3B8;">Start your collection!</span>') + '</div>';
    progressText += '<p style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B; margin: 0;">' + completedCount + ' experience' + (completedCount !== 1 ? 's' : '') + ' completed</p>';

    if (nextBadge) {
      progressText += '<p style="font-size: 12px; color: #94A3B8; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Next badge: ' + nextBadge.emoji + ' ' + nextBadge.name + ' (' + (nextBadge.count - completedCount) + ' more)</p>';
    }

    document.getElementById('badge-progress').innerHTML = progressText;
  }

  function checkExistingCompletion() {
    var completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    if (completions[experienceId]) {
      document.getElementById('completion-trigger').innerHTML =
        '<div style="color: #22C55E; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 8px;">‚úì</div>' +
        '<p style="font-size: 14px; color: #64748B; margin: 0;">You completed this experience on ' + new Date(completions[experienceId].completedAt).toLocaleDateString() + '</p>';
    }
  }

  // ---- Initialise ----
  loadProgress();
  renderProgressBar();
  showStep(currentStep);
  checkExistingCompletion();
})();
</script>
